FuncDef: This command specifies the data rate to use when configured for an OTU encapsulated 10GE-LAN signal. The port must be shut down before changing the 10GE LAN OTU2 data rate.

ParaDef.Info: Configures the port to transmit and receive an 11.049 Gb/s synchronous OTU encapsulated 10GE-LAN signal (No fixed stuffing bytes in the OTU2 frame).
Configures the port to transmit and receive an 11.096 Gb/s synchronous OTU encapsulated 10GE-LAN signal (with fixed stuffing bytes in the OTU2 frame).
